column4: can I install ubuntu from an iso without a burning and booting from it?
there was some thread that showed how to do it if you had an already existing linux distro, it looked  pretty hard, it is on ubuntuforums.org
I see this http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=316093, but it still requires a boot
yeah that is the one I saw, I didn't really look into because burning a cd is nothing so yeah just did it
